health_sector_discussed_people_names: Hon. Rose Chepkoech, Hon. David Macharia, Hon. Simon Kamau Karanja, Hon. Alex Mbugua, Hon. Anthony Kanyere, Hon. William Mutai, Hon. Grace Mwathi, Hon. Jane Gituku, Hon. Evelyn Chepkirui, Hon. Robert Rutto, Hon. James Gathuita
health_data_challenges: Lack of clear timeframes for waste management plans, need for awareness and education on epilepsy, access to medication for epilepsy patients
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Develop a comprehensive database of all epileptic cases in the County and provide free medical services for such patients, provide free medication for people living with epilepsy, create awareness programs on epilepsy
health_evidence_base: Personal experiences, observations, and local challenges
